name: GPT-5 (2025-08-07)
description: GPT-5 is OpenAI's most advanced model released in August 2025, excelling at real-world coding (74.9% on SWE-bench), mathematics (94.6% on AIME 2025), multimodal understanding (84.2% on MMMU), and health-related reasoning. Described as a 'PhD-level expert in your pocket.'
notes: Flagship model with state-of-the-art performance across coding, math, and multimodal tasks. Supports 90% cache discount for recently used tokens. Half the input cost of GPT-4o. This is the timestamped version from August 7, 2025.
